name: special_union_find_applications
chinese_name: 浅谈并查集在OI 中的特殊应用
author: 王相文
complexity: Varies by model: O(q α(n)) for standard optimized DSU; O(n + q) for linear tree-based DSU; O(log n) per operation for rollback DSU; O(q log q log n) for segment-tree-based dynamic graph connectivity.
summary: This paper explores advanced applications of the Union-Find (Disjoint Set Union, DSU) data structure in competitive programming, focusing on three specialized models: linear tree-based Union-Find for path queries, weighted Union-Find for maintaining relative values within sets, and rollback (undoable) Union-Find using heuristic merging. These models are demonstrated through various problems involving offline query processing, sequence partitioning, LCA computation, dynamic connectivity, and more.
